name: Eric SCHREIBER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and, Department of Corrections, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Schreiber v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Eric SCHREIBER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and, Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of December, 2004, the above captioned appeal is quashed as interlocutory. The Emergency Application To Stay Proceedings in Lower Court Pending Disposition of Appeal is dismissed as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
864 A.2d 1199
Eric SCHREIBER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and, Department of Corrections, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 21, 2004.
